channel.title: Compiling problem (Delta)
channel.description:
I am having trouble with compiling my client compiler.
This is what is in my compiler.
@echo off TITLE RuneScape compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -cp . *.java pause
But it keeps saying.. "Error: Could not find or load main class *.java Press any key to continue.."
Could someone help, please?

item.title: Compiling problem (Delta)
item.dc:creator: @k1_blade k1 blade
item.description:
@k1_blade wrote:

I am having trouble with compiling my client compiler.

This is what is in my compiler.

@echo off
TITLE RuneScape compiler
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

But it keeps saying…
“Error: Could not find or load main class *.java
Press any key to continue…”

Could someone help, please?

Read full topic
